I purchased “my size” with this tux but when I put it on,  I was afraid to sit down too quickly and the jacket was tight. So I returned it and went a size up and thought I would swim in it. The larger size fit perfectly and I needed little alterations. I wore the tux to my daughter’s weddings and got several compliments.

Bought this for my son for prom. Good material and nice fit. We had to have the pants and jacket taken in at the waist but he is tall and skinny. It looked great. We used another vest abs tie to match the dress. Overall happy we purchased rather than renting.

Considering the price, and the plastic bag it arrived in…My expectations were that it would be wrinkled, wouldn’t fit and would look cheap,.  HOWEVER to my surprise not a wrinkle on it, looks fantastic and fits like it was tailored exactly for me (just need pants hemmed).  Highly recommend
Nice cut, runs small & unfortunately couldn’t get larger size in time for event
This tux would not have fit better had it been tailored.  Don't rent, when this is cheaper, and better.

If I could give this tux 6, 7 or even 10 stars I would! The quality was phenomenal, the price was ridiculously cheap! Who knew you could get such a nice quality piece on Amazon for under 150 bucks. Renting A tux at a local store was double the price, and I'm not even kidding… The quality of this tux was impeccable. The material was nice and thick, very soft and smooth, and the delivery was incredible. It came double boxed on a hanger, nice and pressed, ready to wear out of the box. It was so good, I wish I needed another one!

Tux, accessories, patten shoes, shirt, bow time, red suspenders all arrive in great condition. Tux jacket sleeves needed alterations suitable to my French cuffs and links, trousers length altered to my needs. The waist needed to be reduced.  All in all, I am very happy with my complete tux. We have weddings starting in late April. Then this suit is great for our Holiday parties.
